name: Moon
description: A crescent moon looms large in the autumn sky. The Moon card points to hidden potential.

person.upright: Someone whose fine qualities are masked by one annoying trait.
person.reverse: A person who seems competent but bungles everything they attempt.

creatureTrap.upright: A lycanthrope, or a creature that appears to be an inanimate object until it strikes (such as a gargoyle).
creatureTrap.reverse: A creature that uses its fearsome appearance to frighten away others because it is too weak to fight.

place.upright: A secret chamber or a place concealed by terrain; alternatively, a place larger or more elaborate on the inside than it seems from outside.
place.reverse: A place with an impressive exterior but a dingy, poorly maintained interior.

treasure.upright: A treasure whose value isn't immediately apparent, or a magic item that appears to be a worthless object.
treasure.reverse: A treasure that seems more valuable than it is, perhaps an ordinary item that falsely appears magical.

situation.upright: A problem that requires investigation and is more complicated than it appears.
situation.reverse: A situation that seems—and is—too good to be true.
